name: cpuscaler
description: Automatically scale the component based on CPU usage.

parameters.usage: Specify the minimal number of replicas to which the autoscaler can scale down
parameters.name: min

parameters.usage: Specify the maximum number of of replicas to which the autoscaler can scale up
parameters.name: max

parameters.usage: Specify the average CPU utilization, for example, 50 means the CPU usage is 50%
parameters.name: cpuUtil

parameters.usage: Specify the apiVersion of scale target
parameters.name: targetAPIVersion

parameters.usage: Specify the kind of scale target
parameters.name: targetKind
